law.history: Repealed 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 254, sec. 39, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 262, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1990; and ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 357, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 159, sec. 2. -- Amended 1949 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 18. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4019a-10.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Reports of banks and trust companies -- Taxes on shares and tangible property.
